body: I believe if we end up with both, we just end up with extra threads spawned. I think the only real client of `get_default_engine` (which I am pretty sure is  dead code anyway)  is an `Eval` node in tracer and a test in `test_jit`. However, in the future, I expect it will get called when backward gets kicked off from C++.
